alert.note: Alert for Lamoille; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 3:52AM EST until February 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Lamoille and Washington Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact both the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow could be moderate at times, with snowfall rates approaching 1 inch per hour. The heaviest snow will be along the eastern slopes of the Green Mountains.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
